alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:40AM EST until December 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer, Southern Fulton, Montgomery, Western Schenectady and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roadways, along with reduced visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates between 0.50 and 0.75 of an inch per hour will be possible at times during the afternoon which could result in more hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Western Schenectady
